posts.post_content: A meh mythic rare. By the time you actually get to play him, you won't have much of a hand, unless you're running some heavy card draw, so he kinda lacks in the tricks department, though a 6/6 flyer for 6 isn't too bad.
posts.html:
A meh mythic rare. By the time you actually get to play him, you won't have much of a hand, unless you're running some heavy card draw, so he kinda lacks in the tricks department, though a 6/6 flyer for 6 isn't too bad.

posts.html:
This Demon Dragon Is Fucking Awesome
Report Abuse  
Posted By: MasterOfEtherium (6/7/2009 7:56:32 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
I enjoy this card, especially in multiplayer. I combine Malfegor with all sorts of stuff: [Reliquary Tower](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Reliquary Tower) to maximize discard potential, [Font of Mythos](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Font of Mythos) to accelerate hand size easily ahead of your opponents' maximum number of creatures they may have in play at the time.  
  
Now use aforementioned combos with certain creature that benefit from the resulting genocide, like I use [Deathbringer Thoctar](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Deathbringer Thoctar), [Thraximundar](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Thraximundar), and [Mortivore](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Mortivore) as damaging potential after using Malfegor's effect.
posts.html:
I enjoy this card, especially in multiplayer. I combine Malfegor with all sorts of stuff: Reliquary Tower to maximize discard potential, Font of Mythos to accelerate hand size easily ahead of your opponents' maximum number of creatures they may have in play at the time.

Now use aforementioned combos with certain creature that benefit from the resulting genocide, like I use Deathbringer Thoctar, Thraximundar, and Mortivore as damaging potential after using Malfegor's effect.
